comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I like the accidental collage-style composition here, including the tuft of cotton (?) and the folded edge and the thumbtack and a creased handwritten scrap... and the flasks in the background seem to indicate this was taken sideways?

comment.author: 62295966@N07
comment._content: Photo was probably taken at Donaldson studio, 927 F St. NW Washington, DC. Note the embossed label.
